product_name: Obermeyer Alias Zip Fleece Top - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Pull on the cozy Obermeyer Alias Zip fleece top to keep the chill of winter from interfering with a fun day on the sledding hill or ski slopes. Fleece-lined collar feels great next to skin. Internal zipper wind guard keeps out cool breezes. Closeout.
short_description: Pull on the cozy Obermeyer Alias Zip fleece top to keep the chill of winter from interfering with a fun day on the sledding hill or ski slopes.
